courseDetails.title: Become a Hydra Expert: Advanced Brute Forcing Techniques
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master Hydra for ethical hacking with real-world examples, covering advanced brute-forcing techniques.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you ready to become an expert in advanced brute-forcing techniques using Hydra? This course is designed to take you from the basics to mastering Hydra, one of the most powerful tools for ethical hacking and penetration testing.

Throughout the course, you’ll learn to identify vulnerable services, craft effective wordlists, and perform brute force attacks on SSH, FTP, and web login forms. We’ll dive into Hydra’s advanced features, including handling proxy support, managing session cookies, and bypassing rate limits. You’ll also explore techniques for tackling high-security challenges like anti-CSRF tokens, making this course perfect for real-world applications.

Each lecture is hands-on, providing you with practical skills and step-by-step demonstrations in a controlled, ethical environment. By the end of the course, you’ll be equipped with the knowledge to use Hydra responsibly and secure systems against brute force attacks.

In addition to practical applications, you’ll gain insights into the ethical and legal aspects of brute forcing, ensuring you can apply these techniques appropriately and safely. Whether you’re an ethical hacker, cybersecurity enthusiast, or beginner looking to expand your skillset, this course is for you.

Join us today and take the next step toward becoming a Hydra expert. Equip yourself with cutting-edge tools and techniques to bolster your cybersecurity knowledge and expertise!
targetAudiences: Ethical hackers and penetration testers looking to master brute force techniques.
Cybersecurity enthusiasts who want to understand the power of Hydra.
Beginners with a foundational knowledge of ethical hacking, eager to explore advanced tools.

Customer experience (CX) is the overall impression customers have of your brand throughout their interactions with your business. It encompasses everything from the initial marketing message to the post-purchase support they receive. Think of it as the customer journey, and CX is all the touchpoints along the way that shape their perception.


Key Areas of CX

  • Customer touchpoints: Every interaction a customer has with your brand, like websites, social media, advertising, in-store experience, and customer service.

  • Customer journey: Mapping out the steps a customer takes to interact with your brand, from awareness to purchase and beyond.

  • Customer satisfaction: How happy customers are with your product or service.

  • Customer loyalty: How likely customers are to return and recommend your brand to others.


CX Frameworks

Frameworks provide a structured approach to improving CX. Here are two common ones:

  • Customer Experience Journey Map: A visual representation of the customer journey, identifying touchpoints and opportunities for improvement.

  • Five Service Dimensions: A framework that focuses on five key aspects of service quality: reliability, responsiveness, assurance, empathy, and tangibles.


Why Learning CXM is Important for Companies:

  1. Improved Customer Satisfaction and Loyalty: CXM focuses on understanding and meeting customer needs, leading to increased satisfaction and a higher likelihood of repeat business.

  2. Enhanced Brand Reputation: Positive customer experiences contribute to a strong brand reputation, attracting new customers and retaining existing ones.

  3. Increased Revenue and Profitability: Satisfied customers are more likely to spend more, refer others, and remain loyal, all of which contribute to revenue growth.

  4. Competitive Advantage: In today's crowded marketplace, exceptional customer experience can be a key differentiator, setting a company apart from its competitors.

  5. Reduced Costs: Resolving customer issues proactively and efficiently can reduce the cost of customer service and support.


Why Learning CXM is Important for Building a Career as a Manager:

  1. In-demand Skill: CXM is a highly sought-after skill in today's business world, as companies increasingly recognize its importance.

  2. Career Advancement: Expertise in CXM can open doors to various managerial roles, such as Customer Experience Manager, Customer Success Manager, or Marketing Manager.

  3. Problem-solving Skills: CXM involves identifying and addressing customer pain points, which enhances problem-solving and analytical skills.

  4. Leadership Development: Managing customer experience initiatives requires strong leadership, communication, and collaboration skills.

  5. Cross-functional Collaboration: CXM often involves working with multiple departments, providing managers with exposure to different areas of the business.


Overall, learning CXM is crucial for companies looking to thrive in the modern business landscape. It's also a valuable investment for managers aiming to build a successful career in various industries.

What is Marketing?

  • Definition: Marketing is the process of identifying customer needs, creating products or services that fulfill those needs, and communicating the value of those offerings to potential customers.

  • Focus: Marketing focuses on getting the right message to the right audience, ultimately driving interest and sales.

  • Key Activities:

    • Market research

    • Product development

    • Brand building

    • Advertising and promotions

    • Content creation

    • Customer relationship management


What is Marketing Management?

  • Definition: Marketing management is the strategic and operational process of planning, organizing, implementing, and controlling an organization's marketing resources and activities.

  • Focus: Marketing management aims to create a cohesive marketing plan, optimize resource allocation, and measure the effectiveness of marketing initiatives.

  • Key Activities:

    • Developing marketing strategies and plans

    • Setting marketing budgets

    • Managing marketing teams

    • Overseeing marketing campaigns

    • Analyzing marketing performance (tracking metrics and ROI)

    • Making adjustments to strategies as needed


The Relationship Between Marketing and Marketing Management

Think of marketing as the actions you take to promote your business, and marketing management as the overarching system to plan, execute, and refine those actions strategically.


Here's a simple analogy:

  • Marketing is like cooking a delicious meal. It involves finding the right recipe (products/services), sourcing the best ingredients (market research), and carefully preparing the dish (advertising, promotions).

  • Marketing Management is like being the head chef. They devise the overall menu (marketing strategy), manage the kitchen staff (marketing teams), ensure the budget is efficient, and keep track of customer feedback (measuring results) to perfect future meals.

Social Media Marketing (SMM):

Social Media Marketing is a form of digital marketing that utilizes social media platforms to promote products, services, or brands. It involves creating and sharing content on social media networks to engage with a target audience, increase brand awareness, and drive website traffic. SMM encompasses various activities such as posting text and image updates, videos, and other content that sparks user engagement.


Social Media Management:

Social Media Management involves the strategic planning, monitoring, and execution of a company's social media marketing efforts. It includes tasks like creating content calendars, responding to comments and messages, analyzing performance metrics, and adjusting strategies based on data.


Why Social Media Marketing Matters

Social media marketing offers numerous advantages for businesses of all sizes and across all industries. Here are some key benefits:

  • Increased Brand Awareness: Social media platforms provide a powerful tool to reach a wider audience and establish your brand identity. By consistently sharing valuable content and engaging with your followers, you can build brand recognition and create a positive brand image.

  • Enhanced Customer Engagement: Social media fosters two-way communication, allowing you to connect with your customers directly. You can address their questions and concerns, build relationships, and foster brand loyalty.

  • Lead Generation and Sales Growth: Social media campaigns can generate leads by attracting potential customers and directing them to your website or landing pages. You can leverage targeted advertising and calls to action to convert leads into paying customers.

  • Market Research and Insights: Social media listening tools allow you to track brand mentions, analyze audience demographics and interests, and gain valuable insights into customer sentiment. This information can be used to refine your marketing strategies and tailor content to resonate better with your target audience.

  • Improved Brand Reputation Management: Social media allows you to proactively manage your brand reputation by addressing negative feedback promptly and showcasing positive customer experiences.


Importance for Companies and Managers:


Enhanced Communication:

Social media marketing and management skills enable companies to communicate directly with their audience, fostering brand loyalty and customer satisfaction.


Brand Building:

Social media is a powerful tool for brand building. Effective SMM can enhance brand visibility and reputation, leading to increased trust and credibility.


Customer Engagement:

Social media management allows companies to engage with their audience in real-time, addressing concerns, gathering feedback, and building a community around the brand.


Marketing Effectiveness:

Social media platforms provide targeted advertising options. Knowing how to leverage these tools through SMM enhances the effectiveness of marketing campaigns.


Career Development and Business Success:


Versatility:

Learning social media marketing, management, equips professionals with versatile skills applicable across various industries and roles.


Competitive Edge:

Professionals who master these skills have a competitive advantage in the job market. Companies value employees who can effectively communicate, market products, and manage social media presence.


Entrepreneurial Success:

For entrepreneurs, these skills are crucial for establishing and promoting their own businesses. Effective communication and marketing strategies can significantly contribute to business success.


Adaptability:

In a rapidly evolving digital landscape, individuals who continuously enhance their skills in these areas demonstrate adaptability and are better positioned for career growth and business development.


The solid understanding of social media marketing, management and business writing is invaluable for companies and managers. It not only facilitates effective communication but also contributes to brand building, marketing success, and overall career development. In the dynamic business environment, these skills are instrumental in staying competitive and achieving long-term success.

courseDetails.title: Migra un Sitio Web de WordPress a otro Dominio o Hosting
courseDetails.shortDescription: Migra un sitio web de WordPress a otro dominio o hosting, sin saber de programación, de forma fácil y simple.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿DESEAS APRENDER A MIGRAR UN SITIO WEB DE WORDPRESS A OTRO DOMINIO O HOSTING?


Únete a nuestro curso para mostrarte cómo migrar un sitio web de WordPress completo a otro dominio o hosting, para dicho proceso, podemos utilizar uno de estos dos plugins: All in One WP Migration o SiteGround Migrator.


All in One WP Migration es un plugin que facilita la migración de un sitio hecho en WordPress de forma rápida y sencilla.


Permite exportar todo el contenido como entradas, post, plugins, base de datos, imágenes, temas, etc.


Para realizar este proceso no necesitas ningún tipo de conocimiento técnico ni de programación, ya que se realiza de una forma fácil y veloz.


Para migrar un sitio web en WordPress con el plugin All in One WP Migration, básicamente hay que realizar los siguientes pasos:

  • Instalar el plugin All-in-One WP Migration.

  • Dar clic al botón de exportar para compilar tu base de datos, archivos de medios, plugins, y temas en un archivo compacto.

  • Desempacar el archivo en la nueva ubicación o dominio con una función de “arrastrar y soltar” fácil de usar en el panel de WordPress de tu nuevo sitio web.


SiteGround Migrator es un plugin gratuito de WordPress desarrollado por SiteGround que nos ayuda a migrar un sitio web con WordPress a tu cuenta en SiteGround desde cualquier otra compañía de alojamiento web.


Para migrar un sitio web en WordPress con el plugin SiteGround Migrator, básicamente hay que realizar los siguientes pasos:

  • Generar un token de migración en el Site Tools de SiteGround.

  • Instalar el plugin SiteGround Migrator en tu WordPress.

  • Pegar el token de migración en el plugin para comenzar la migración.

  • Comprobar tu sitio y actualizar los registros DNS para terminar la migración.

What is Product Management?

Product Management is a multifaceted discipline that encompasses the planning, development, marketing, and optimization of a product or service throughout its lifecycle. It involves aligning customer needs with business goals and coordinating cross-functional teams to deliver successful and valuable products. Product managers act as the linchpin between various departments, ensuring seamless communication and collaboration.


Why is Learning Product Management Important for Companies and Experts?

  1. Market Relevance and Competitiveness:

    • In an era of rapid technological advancements and evolving consumer preferences, companies must stay relevant. Product management equips professionals with the skills to identify market trends, understand customer needs, and develop products that outpace competitors

  2. Customer-Centric Approach:

    • Successful products are those that solve real problems for customers. Product management emphasizes a customer-centric approach, ensuring that the product aligns with user needs and expectations. This focus enhances customer satisfaction and loyalty

  3. Optimized Resource Allocation:

    • Product managers are adept at prioritizing features and functionalities based on business goals and customer needs. This strategic allocation of resources ensures that the most critical aspects of a product are addressed, maximizing the impact of limited resources

  4. Effective Communication and Collaboration:

    • Product managers act as bridges between various departments, fostering effective communication and collaboration. This ensures that development, marketing, sales, and other teams work cohesively toward a common goal, reducing silos and enhancing overall efficiency

  5. Adaptability and Innovation:

    • The product management discipline encourages a mindset of continuous improvement and innovation. Professionals in this field are equipped to adapt to changing market conditions, incorporate feedback, and drive iterative development, fostering a culture of innovation within the organization

How Knowledge of Product Management Aids Career Development:

  1. Cross-Functional Skillset:

    • Product management requires a diverse skill set that includes market research, strategic planning, communication, and project management. Professionals with expertise in these areas are highly sought after, making product management a versatile career path

  2. Leadership Opportunities:

    • Product managers often take on leadership roles, overseeing teams and guiding product development strategies. The ability to lead cross-functional teams and drive product success positions individuals for advancement in their careers

  3. Entrepreneurial Mindset:

    • Product managers are often viewed as the "CEOs of their products." Learning product management instills an entrepreneurial mindset, empowering individuals to take ownership of their projects and make strategic decisions that impact the success of the product

  4. Global Perspective:

    • As products have a global reach, product managers gain exposure to international markets and diverse customer bases. This global perspective enhances their ability to navigate the complexities of the modern business landscape

Product management is a critical discipline for companies aiming to thrive in today's dynamic markets. For professionals, mastering product management opens doors to leadership roles, cultivates an entrepreneurial mindset, and provides a comprehensive skill set that is invaluable in the ever-evolving business landscape.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at Product Management or improve their knowledge.

Course Description:

Introduction to Python Development is a course designed to introduce individuals to the world of Python programming. Python has gained immense popularity in recent years for its simplicity, versatility, and readability. This course is ideal for beginners who are new to programming.


Importance For Companies:

Versatility: Python is versatile and can be used for a wide range of applications, from web development and data analysis to artificial intelligence and automation. Companies can benefit from having Python developers who can adapt to various projects.


Productivity: Python's clean and readable syntax allows developers to write code more quickly and efficiently. This results in faster project development and reduced costs for companies.


Large Ecosystem: Python has a vast ecosystem of libraries and frameworks, making it easier for companies to find solutions to their specific needs. This reduces the need for reinventing the wheel.


Data Analysis and AI: Python is a go-to language for data analysis and machine learning. Companies can leverage Python to extract valuable insights from data and build AI-driven applications.


Community and Support: Python has a strong and active community of developers. Companies can tap into this community for support, resources, and talent recruitment.


Importance For Developers:


Career Opportunities: Learning Python opens up a wide range of career opportunities in various industries. Python developers are in high demand, and their skills are transferable to different domains.


Diversity of Roles: Python developers can work in roles such as web developer, data analyst, data scientist, machine learning engineer, and more. This diversity allows developers to explore different areas of interest.


Ease of Learning: Python's straightforward syntax makes it an ideal choice for beginners in programming. It's also accessible to experienced developers looking to add another language to their skill set.


Continuous Growth: Python is constantly evolving, with new libraries and frameworks being developed. This means that developers who invest in Python education can continue to grow their skill set over time.


Remote Work Opportunities: Python development often allows for remote work, providing developers with flexibility in their careers.


The course "Introduction to Python Development" provides a foundation for individuals looking to embark on a career in programming or expand their skill set. Python's significance in the tech industry, its versatility, and its demand in the job market make it a valuable asset for both companies and developers aiming to excel in today's technology-driven world.

Mejor imagen corporativa: Es la primera ventaja que surge de contar con un dominio propio. Le aporta seriedad, confianza y autoridad a tu marca ante tus clientes y proveedores.


De este modo, el dominio te ayuda a mostrar una imagen que refleje compromiso y confianza, y además es una forma de permitir que los usuarios identifiquen fácilmente tu negocio online.


Y es que no genera mucha confianza una empresa cuyo correo electrónico sea una cuenta de Gmail o de Outlook (Hotmail).


Comunicación más efectiva: Muchos emprendedores suelen mezclar las soluciones de comunicación efectivas con las que son de carácter gratuito.


Con esto nos referimos a que elegir una cuenta de correo electrónico gratuito significa quedar atado a ciertas características indeseables. Imaginemos que le enviamos una propuesta interesante a uno de nuestros mejores clientes. Es posible que, ese email termine perdido en la bandeja de Spam, por lo que se aumentan las probabilidades de que nunca sea abierto.


Un gran porcentaje de cuentas gratuitas se utiliza para hacer spam y tus mail pueden ser catalogados de la misma manera si son de cuentas gratuitas. Es un riesgo que no vale nada la pena.


Así pues, contar con un dominio propio hará que tus clientes reciban con seguridad todos tus emails con promociones e información que podría interesarles en su bandeja de entrada principal, por lo que no perderás ninguna oportunidad.


Mejor gestión de información y comunicación: Una de las mejores ventajas de contar con un dominio para los correos electrónicos de tu empresa, es que este te permite crear listas o grupos de trabajo. De este modo, tus colaboradores podrán comunicarse de una manera más sencilla y profesional, al mismo tiempo que aumentan el rendimiento del trabajo en equipo.


Garantiza tu privacidad: sino lo sabías, al crear una cuenta de email en una empresa como Google, debes aceptar obligatoriamente sus políticas de privacidad. Esto significa que Google tendrá acceso a tu información, por lo que esta será usada para mostrarte publicidad personalizada.


En cambio, con un dominio y servidor propio, tendrás la tranquilidad de mantener los datos y la información de tu empresa en buenas manos, pues tu empresa de hosting te garantiza no compartir esta información con terceros. Así, solo tu tendrás control absoluto de tu información.


Mayor seguridad de tus correos: al momento de gestionar una cuenta de correos esto es muy importante. Casi todos los servicios de correos corporativos tienen mayores medidas y protocolos de seguridad ante el posible hackeo o ataque a través de virus por terceros. Existen antivirus, firewalls y filtros anti-spam muy avanzados para proteger tu información confidencial, tus cuentas, dispositivos y equipos.


EN ESTE CURSO, APRENDERÁS:

  • Cómo obtener un dominio y hosting para crear tus correos corporativos con dominio propio.

  • Cómo conectar el dominio a tu plan de hosting para comenzar a crear tus correos corporativos con dominio propio.

  • Cómo crear una cuenta de correo electrónico en Gmail.

  • Cómo configurar tu correo corporativo con dominio propio en Gmail.

Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 208 countries and has been chosen by more than 400 000 students.


Role of Mortgage and Lending Brokers

  • Intermediary: Brokers act as the bridge between individuals/businesses seeking loans and the financial institutions that provide them.

  • Consultants and Educators: Brokers guide clients through the complicated world of mortgages and loans, explaining different options and their suitability.

  • Advocates: Brokers work to secure the best possible interest rates and terms for their clients, often negotiating on their behalf.


Typical Functions

  1. Assessing Client Needs: Brokers analyze a borrower's financial situation, goals, and credit history.

  2. Finding Suitable Lenders: They tap into their network of lenders to match the borrower with institutions that fit their profile.

  3. Comparing Options: Brokers present a range of loan products, explaining interest rates, terms, and fees of each.

  4. Application Assistance: They help clients gather paperwork and complete the loan application process.

  5. Underwriting Support: Brokers often act as liaisons between borrowers and lenders during the underwriting (approval) phase.


Why Launching a Business in Broking is a Great Idea

  • Strong Market Demand: The mortgage and lending market is complex and constantly evolving, leading to a high need for expert guidance.

  • Entrepreneurial Flexibility: Brokers enjoy the independence of running their own business, setting their hours, and building their clientele.

  • Income Potential: Earning is commission-based, creating a strong link between your effort and financial success.

  • Rewarding Work: Brokers play a crucial role in helping people achieve major goals like homeownership or business expansion.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career in mortgage and lending brokering

courseDetails.title: Cómo Crear una Página Web Para Google Adsense 2025
courseDetails.shortDescription: Crea una página web de nicho y genera ingresos con los anuncios de Google Adsense.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿DESEAS CREAR UNA PÁGINA WEB Y GENERAR INGRESOS CON LOS ANUNCIOS DE GOOGLE ADSENSE?


Google AdSense es un programa que permite a los propietarios de sitios web, blogs o foros monetizar sus contenidos con anuncios. Los anuncios se colocan en el sitio web y los editores obtienen ingresos en función de la cantidad de usuarios que los vean o interactúen con ellos.


Google AdSense elige los anuncios más adecuados para el sitio web en función del contenido y de los usuarios que lo visitan. Los anunciantes crean y pagan por los anuncios. La cantidad de ingresos que obtiene el editor varía en función del tipo de anuncio y de la cantidad de usuarios que interactúan con él.


¿CÓMO FUNCIONA LA PLATAFORMA DE WORDPRESS?


WordPress es un software gratuito o herramienta de gestión de contenidos, también llamado CMS (Content Management System), diseñada para crear y mantener fácilmente un Blog, un sitio Web o una Tienda Online.


WordPress es sin duda alguna, el mejor gestor de contenidos del mundo, y el más utilizado con diferencia, llegando actualmente a superar el 58% de cuota de mercado. Además es de código abierto y completamente gratuito.


Empezó en 2003 como un software para blogs, pero con el tiempo ha evolucionado como CMS completo con el que podemos hacer sitios web corporativos, tiendas online, sitios de membresía, intranets y mucho más.


En nuestro curso utilizaremos las últimas técnicas para crear y diseñar una página web para Google Adsense, utilizando la plataforma de WordPress y el tema de Hostinger para Afiliados que nos brinda la flexibilidad de crear y diseñar nuestra página web para Google Adsense, que llevarán su diseño web al siguiente nivel.

Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos crearemos su página web para Google Adsense, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, tendrá su sitio web diseñado con su personalización y a su gusto.



¿QUÉ APRENDERÁS EN NUESTRO CURSO?

  • Cómo obtener un dominio y hosting para crear tu página web para Google Adsense.

Public Relations  is a strategic communication process that organizations, individuals, or brands use to build and maintain positive relationships with their target audience, stakeholders, and the public. The goal of PR is to create a favorable image, enhance reputation, and manage perceptions through various communication channels.

PR Management involves planning, executing, and monitoring communication strategies to achieve specific objectives, such as promoting a product, managing a crisis, or building brand awareness. It encompasses activities like media relations, event planning, social media management, and crisis communication.

Learning about PR is crucial for companies and managers for several reasons:

  1. Building and Maintaining Reputation: A positive public image is essential for the success of any organization. PR helps in shaping public perception and building a strong, favorable reputation.

  2. Effective Communication: PR teaches effective communication strategies that allow organizations to convey their messages clearly and persuasively, fostering understanding and positive relationships with the audience.

  3. Crisis Management: In times of crisis, effective PR can help minimize damage to a company's reputation. Understanding how to handle and communicate during crises is a vital skill for managers.

  4. Media Relations: PR equips managers with the skills to interact with the media, ensuring that their messages are accurately portrayed in news outlets and other public platforms.

  5. Brand Building: PR plays a significant role in brand building by creating and maintaining a consistent brand image. It helps in differentiating a company or product in a competitive market.

  6. Stakeholder Engagement: Understanding PR is crucial for engaging with various stakeholders, including customers, employees, investors, and the community. It fosters positive relationships and loyalty.

For managers in different domains, PR knowledge supports career development by:

  1. Enhancing Leadership Skills: PR skills contribute to effective leadership by providing managers with the ability to inspire and motivate teams, especially during challenging times.

  2. Building Relationships: PR fosters relationship-building skills, which are essential in managerial roles for collaborating with internal teams, external partners, and stakeholders.

  3. Strategic Decision-Making: PR knowledge enables managers to make informed and strategic decisions regarding communication, marketing, and overall organizational strategy.

  4. Adaptability: In a dynamic business environment, PR skills help managers adapt to changing circumstances, especially in the face of crises or challenges.

  5. Career Advancement: Managers with PR expertise are often better positioned for career advancement, as they can contribute to the overall success and positive image of the organizations they work for.

In summary, learning about PR is crucial for companies and managers as it helps in building and maintaining a positive public image, fostering effective communication, managing crises, and supporting overall career development in various domains.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at public relations, advertising, marketing, management, SMM, also for the ones who want to improve their business.

courseDetails.title: Investigação em Estratégia e Desenvolvimento de Produtos
courseDetails.shortDescription: Diploma Profissional em Metodologias de Investigação em Estratégia e Desenvolvimento de Produtos pelo MTF Institute
courseDetails.longDescription:
Bem-vindo ao Curso: Diploma Profissional em Metodologias de Investigação em Estratégia e Desenvolvimento de Produtos pelo MTF Institute


Curso ministrado pelo MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

O MTF é um instituto global de educação e investigação com sede em Lisboa, Portugal, focado na formação empresarial e profissional híbrida (presencial e online) nas áreas de: Negócios e Administração, Ciência e Tecnologia, Banca e Finanças.

O centro de I&D do MTF foca-se em atividades de investigação nas áreas de: Inteligência Artificial, Aprendizagem Automática ("Machine Learning"), Ciência de Dados, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Criptomoedas e Ativos Digitais, Metaversos, Transformação Digital, Fintech, Comércio Eletrónico, e Internet das Coisas.

O MTF é parceiro oficial da: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, membro da Câmara Portuguesa de Comércio e Indústria.

O MTF está presente em 208 países e foi escolhido por mais de 420 000 alunos.


Autora do Curso:

Alex Amoroso é uma profissional experiente com uma sólida formação académica e empresarial, especializada em metodologias de investigação, formulação de estratégias, e desenvolvimento de produtos. Doutorada pela Faculdade de Ciências Sociais e Políticas de Lisboa, Portugal, onde foi Aprovada com Distinção e Louvor pela sua investigação exemplar, Alex Amoroso traz consigo um vasto conhecimento e experiência.

Para além dos seus estudos de doutoramento, a Doutora Amoroso tem atuado como Professora Convidada, ministrando cursos a uma vasta gama de estudantes desde a licenciatura até alunos de cursos profissionais e executivos. Atualmente, na EIMT em Zurique, Suíça, leciona para doutorandos, oferecendo instrução avançada em desenho e metodologias de investigação. No Instituto MTF, a Doutora Amoroso lidera a área académica de Desenvolvimento de Produto.

Em sinergia entre a experiência académica e empresarial, a Doutora Amoroso alcançou elevados resultados na sua carreira profissional, liderando atividades de I&D, desenvolvimento de produtos, desenvolvimento estratégico, e análise de mercado num vasto leque de empresas. Implementou as melhores práticas de mercado em setores que vão da Banca e Finanças, ao PropTech, Consultoria e Investigação, e Startups Inovadoras.

A extensa produção científica de Alex Amoroso inclui numerosos artigos publicados em revistas conceituadas, bem como apresentações orais e posters em conferências internacionais. Os resultados da sua investigação têm sido apresentados em instituições de renome como a Faculdade de Ciências Políticas e Sociais e a Stressed Out Conference na UCL, entre outras.

Com uma paixão pela colaboração interdisciplinar e um compromisso em impulsionar mudanças positivas, Alex Amoroso dedica-se a capacitar alunos e profissionais para a utilização de metodologias de vanguarda para alcançar a excelência no mundo empresarial global.


Objetivos do Curso:

● Dotar-vos de conhecimentos e competências para uma eficaz tomada de decisão

● Enfatizar a inovação centrada no ser humano e o conhecimento executável

● Abordagem multidisciplinar para a inovação e desenvolvimento de produtos


O que são Metodologias de Investigação em Estratégia e Desenvolvimento de Produtos?

As metodologias de investigação em estratégia e desenvolvimento de produtos são as abordagens e ferramentas estruturadas utilizadas para recolher, analisar e interpretar informação que apoia planos estratégicos e a criação de produtos. Garantem que as decisões estão enraizadas em provas e nas necessidades dos clientes, e não em suposições.


Principais Focos das Metodologias de Investigação em Estratégia e Desenvolvimento de Produtos

● Estudo de Mercado: Compreender a dimensão, tendências, concorrência e oportunidades dentro de um mercado ou indústria específica.

● Investigação de Clientes: Investigar as necessidades, pontos problemáticos, comportamentos e preferências do seu público-alvo.

● Análise da Concorrência: Avaliar os pontos fortes, fracos, estratégias e quota de mercado dos concorrentes.

● Análise de Tendências: Identificar padrões emergentes, tecnologias, ou preferências dos clientes que possam moldar o futuro.

● Análise Interna: Analisar os pontos fortes, fraquezas, capacidades e recursos de uma empresa para informar a estratégia.

● Teste de Conceito de Produto: Recolher feedback sobre ideias de produtos propostas numa fase inicial do processo de desenvolvimento.

● Teste de Usabilidade: Avaliar se um produto é fácil e intuitivo de usar.
targetAudiences: Sem requisitos especiais. Um curso para qualquer pessoa que queira construir uma carreira em Estratégia e Desenvolvimento de Produtos

Business leadership is the art of guiding an organization towards success. It involves setting a clear vision, inspiring employees, and making strategic decisions that propel the company forward. Effective leaders create a positive work environment where people feel motivated and empowered to contribute their best.


Core Functions of a Business Leader:

  • Visionary: Business leaders paint a picture of the future – the company's goals and aspirations. They articulate a compelling vision that excites and unites the team.

  • Strategic Decision-Making: Leaders make tough calls, weighing risks and opportunities to navigate the business towards its goals.

  • Motivator and Coach: They inspire and empower employees, helping them grow and develop their skills.

  • Effective Communicator: Leaders clearly communicate the vision, plans, and expectations to everyone in the organization.

  • Team Builder: They foster collaboration and build strong, cohesive teams that work effectively together.


Why Leadership Skills Matter for Your Career:

Developing leadership skills is crucial for career advancement. Here's why:

  • Increased Visibility: Leaders stand out. They take initiative, solve problems, and get things done, which grabs the attention of superiors.

  • Promotion Potential: Companies are always looking for strong leaders to fill management positions.

  • Stronger Teams: If you can lead and motivate others, you'll be a valuable asset on any team, making you a desirable candidate for projects and assignments.

  • Adaptability and Change: The business world is constantly evolving. Strong leadership skills equip you to adapt to change and navigate challenges.

What is Career Coaching?

Career coaching is a collaborative process between a coach and a client (the coachee). The coach helps the client gain clarity and strategize to achieve their professional goals. This might involve anything from making a major career transition to navigating challenges in their current role


Main Areas of Career Coaching

Career coaching covers a wide range of focus areas. Some of the most common include:

  • Career Exploration: Helping clients define their strengths, interests, and ideal work environments.

  • Goal Setting: Working with clients to set actionable and achievable career goals.

  • Job Search Strategies: Creating effective resumes, cover letters, and improving interviewing skills.

  • Networking and Branding: Building professional networks and developing a strong personal brand.

  • Negotiation Skills: Coaching clients on how to negotiate salary, benefits, and promotions.

  • Leadership Development: Helping those looking to advance into leadership roles grow the necessary skills

  • Performance Enhancement: Identifying areas for improvement and providing strategies to excel in a current role.


How Career Coaching Skills Benefit Clients and Your Own Career

The skills involved in career coaching offer multi-faceted benefits:


Benefits for Consulting Practice

  • Enhanced Client Understanding: Develops deep skills for understanding client needs, goals, and challenges.

  • Goal-Oriented Communication: Provides frameworks for setting clear expectations and tracking progress.

  • Empowerment Strategies: Teaches how to empower clients to take ownership over their careers.

  • Diverse Toolkit: Develops skills like active listening, feedback, and motivational techniques – highly transferable in various consulting fields.

Benefits for Your Own Career Development

  • Self-Awareness: The process forces you to reflect on your own career journey, values, goals, and areas for development.

  • Proactive Mindset: Encouraging clients to take charge translates into your own approach, leading to greater career ownership.

  • Network Expansion: Increases exposure to professionals in various industries, broadening your network and potential opportunities.

  • Growth Mentality: Fosters a focus on continuous learning essential for success in any field.

In today’s rapidly evolving digital landscape, artificial intelligence (AI) has become a transformative force across industries, reshaping how businesses operate and compete. This course dives deeply into the foundational theories and strategic applications of AI in business, providing a comprehensive exploration of AI-powered business models and the profound shift from traditional to AI-driven approaches. Through a structured, theory-rich curriculum, participants will gain a robust understanding of AI’s capabilities, particularly in generative AI, and how it influences business transformation. From operational efficiencies to customer experience enhancement, AI’s reach is vast, and this course offers an in-depth look at each dimension, equipping learners with the knowledge to evaluate and envision AI applications within their own organizations.

Starting with the essential concepts of AI in business, the course establishes a foundation by defining AI’s impact on modern business models. The curriculum highlights the paradigm shift from traditional structures to innovative, AI-powered frameworks, illustrating how AI technologies are reshaping entire industries. Learners will examine the core components of AI, its transformative influence, and the importance of adaptability in today’s digital economy. By understanding these changes, participants will appreciate the need for flexibility and strategic thinking to navigate the evolving business landscape, ensuring their organizations can harness AI’s potential effectively.

As the course progresses, learners will delve into the specifics of generative AI, a subset of AI with unique capabilities to create, adapt, and innovate within various business domains. This segment introduces the different types of generative AI models, the technologies driving them, and their application in business strategy. Participants will explore how generative AI contributes to personalized solutions, making a significant impact on customer experience and competitive differentiation. Through detailed discussions, learners will gain insights into how generative AI fosters innovation and supports data-driven decision-making, essential for strategic growth in a digital-first market.

In identifying business opportunities that align with AI, the course emphasizes the importance of recognizing areas where AI can enhance business value. Learners will examine the factors driving AI integration, including market segmentation, revenue streams, and customer insights. With AI’s ability to process and analyze data at an unprecedented scale, businesses can uncover nuanced customer needs, anticipate trends, and refine their offerings. By understanding these drivers, students will learn to pinpoint where AI can deliver the greatest impact, maximizing both customer satisfaction and profitability.

Product and service innovation takes center stage in the following section, illustrating AI’s role in developing and customizing solutions tailored to specific customer needs. The curriculum explores how AI can enhance product lifecycle management, service personalization, and differentiation, allowing businesses to stand out in crowded markets. Learners will appreciate how AI fosters a unique customer value proposition, transforming how products and services evolve in response to real-time market changes. This theoretical groundwork empowers participants to reimagine product development, positioning AI as a tool for continuous innovation and sustainable competitive advantage.

Customer experience is a critical factor in business success, and this course investigates how AI revolutionizes engagement and personalization strategies. From designing AI-driven customer experiences to optimizing interactions, learners will understand how AI insights enhance engagement and retention. The course emphasizes personalization, a key AI application in fostering deeper connections with customers, and introduces techniques for automating and enhancing service quality. By grasping the theoretical foundations of AI in customer experience, participants will gain a solid understanding of how to apply these insights to build meaningful, lasting relationships with clients.

Revenue models are another focal point, as AI enables businesses to explore new income streams and financial strategies. The curriculum covers subscription-based models, pay-per-use structures, and value-based revenue streams, highlighting how AI can enhance revenue forecasting and predictive analytics. By understanding these concepts, learners can evaluate the potential of AI to shape innovative revenue strategies, ensuring financial sustainability and adaptability in diverse markets. The emphasis on these theories allows participants to conceptualize and plan revenue models that leverage AI’s strengths for long-term growth.

Operational efficiency is fundamental to organizational success, and AI offers unparalleled opportunities for streamlining processes and reducing costs. This course provides a theoretical framework for understanding how AI optimizes workflows, automates tasks, and enhances decision-making processes. Participants will explore how AI minimizes operational bottlenecks and supports more efficient management practices. These theories underscore AI’s transformative effect on day-to-day operations, giving learners the insights necessary to implement AI for sustainable improvements in efficiency and productivity.

Finally, the course addresses AI’s role in business decision-making, ethics, compliance, and data strategy. As AI becomes a powerful tool for strategic decision-making, it raises important ethical considerations around transparency, fairness, and bias mitigation. The curriculum examines how businesses can navigate these challenges responsibly, ensuring ethical AI adoption that respects customer trust and complies with regulatory standards. By covering these crucial topics, the course equips participants with a nuanced understanding of AI’s role in creating responsible, forward-thinking business strategies.

In conclusion, this course offers a comprehensive exploration of the theoretical frameworks underpinning AI-powered business models. Through rigorous study, participants will understand how AI reshapes operations, enhances customer engagement, and introduces innovative revenue opportunities. Each module is crafted to build a deep understanding of AI’s strategic potential, providing learners with the knowledge to make informed, ethical, and future-ready decisions in an AI-driven world. Business Analyst Certification by Agile Enterprise Coach London


Unlock your Full Potential with the Business Analyst Certification by Agile Enterprise Coach London

Welcome to the Business Analyst Certification course, a rigorous assessment-based program designed to validate and enhance your understanding of the core principles and practices of business analysis as outlined in the BCS Business Analysis Fourth Edition Book. This course is meticulously structured to not only assess your knowledge but also to provide a clear pathway for personal and professional growth in the field of business analysis. Hosted on Udemy, this certification stands as a beacon for aspiring and established business analysts alike, aiming to equip you with a certification that is recognized and valued across industries.


Note: This course is only having exams/ assessments and does not have any videos or theory.


How to Get Certified

  1. Study the BCS Business Analysis Fourth Edition Book: Familiarize yourself with all the concepts and guidelines.

  2. Take the Assessment: Complete the multiple-choice questions to the best of your ability.

  3. Submit Proof of Completion: Send us screenshots of your passed tests to us to receive your Business Analyst Certificate from Agile Enterprise Coach London.

  4. Add to Your Credentials: Include your certification in your CV. For assistance with obtaining your certificate, please reach out to us via email to info at agileenterprisecoach dot org dot uk.


Why Choose this Business Analyst Certification?

In a rapidly evolving business landscape, the demand for skilled business analysts who can bridge the gap between IT and business objectives has never been higher. Our certification is crafted to reflect the depth and breadth of the competencies, techniques, and insights needed to succeed in this pivotal role. By choosing this course, you are not just preparing for an assessment; you are stepping into a journey of professional development that aligns with the prestigious Business Analysis standards. Here’s what sets our Business Analyst Certification Assessment apart:


  • Real-World Relevance: Questions are designed to challenge and reflect real-life scenarios that Business Analysts encounter, ensuring practical understanding.

  • Business Analyst Certificate: Successful candidates can request a Business Analyst Certificate for this course to be issued by Agile Enterprise coach, adding a tangible credential to their professional portfolio.


For Employees/ Individuals: Advance Your Business Analyst Career

As an aspiring or current Business Analyst, this assessment/certification will serve as a benchmark for your Business Analysis knowledge and skills, allowing you to:

  • Validate Expertise: Demonstrate your mastery of the Business Analysis competencies and techniques and stand out in a competitive job market.

  • Professional Development: Identify your strengths and areas for improvement, guiding your learning journey and enhancing your capabilities in business analysis.

  • Career Advancement: Enhance your resume and LinkedIn profile with the certification, opening doors to new opportunities and career growth. Stand out in the job market and open doors to new opportunities with a certification that showcases your expertise and commitment to continuous learning.

  • Credibility and Recognition: Gain the confidence of peers and employers with a certification that showcases your commitment to the Business Analyst mindset.

  • Global Network: Join a community of certified business analysts and management consultants expanding your professional network and connecting with industry leaders.


For Organisations/Project Teams: Elevate Your Team's Business Analysis Capabilities

In the fast-paced world of technology and product management, Business Analysis have become the cornerstone of successful product/project delivery. Building Business Analysis capabilities within your organization can revolutionize the way you manage projects, enhance team collaboration, and drive better product/project outcomes. Our Business Analyst Certification Assessment offers numerous advantages for your organisation:

  • Skill Validation: Ensure your teams are equipped with standardized and recognized business analysis skills, fostering a common language and understanding across projects.

  • Continuous Improvement: Pinpoint areas where your Business Analysis teams excel and where they need further training, fostering a culture of continuous learning and development.

  • Competitive Edge: By having certified Business Analysts, your company can stay ahead of the curve in delivering Business Analysis Services, attracting clients and projects that value certified expertise.

  • Strategic Alignment: Empower your business analysts to align IT solutions with business strategies, improving project outcomes and business value.

  • Innovation and Efficiency: Certified business analysts can lead the way in identifying opportunities for improvement and innovation, driving efficiency and competitive advantage.

  • Risk Mitigation: Through rigorous analysis and requirement gathering, minimize project risks and ensure solutions meet stakeholder needs.


The Role of a Business Analyst:

At the heart of any successful project is the Business Analyst, a strategic navigator whose expertise shapes the future of business solutions. Key highlights of business analyst role include:

  • Strategic Analysis: Understanding the business context, identifying business needs, and defining solutions that deliver value.

  • Stakeholder Engagement: Effectively engaging with and managing stakeholders throughout the lifecycle of a project, ensuring their needs are understood and addressed.

  • Requirements Engineering: Capturing, analysing, validating, and documenting business, functional, and technical requirements.

  • Solution Evaluation: Assessing the performance of and value delivered by a solution, ensuring it meets business needs and requirements.


Assessment Structure and Content

The Business Analyst Certification Assessment consists of a series of multiple-choice questions covering a wide range of topics, including but not limited to:

  • 1. What is business analysis?

  • 2. The competencies of a business analyst

  • 3. The strategic context for business analysis

  • 4. The business analysis service framework

  • 5. Investigating the business situation

  • 6. Analysing and managing stakeholders

  • 7. Improving business services and processes

  • 8. Defining the solution

  • 9. Making the business case

  • 10. Establishing the requirements

  • 11. Documenting and modelling requirements

  • 12. Validating and managing requirements

  • 13. Delivering the requirements

  • 14. Delivering the business solution

You will know about: what is coaching, its types, components, rules; skills and competencies of coaches, how to proceed a coaching session and coaching methods and tools. After finishing a course you will get: key knowledge about coaching and how to implement it in effective ways


The Crucial Role of Coaching Techniques in Managerial Leadership and Career Development

The role of a manager goes far beyond traditional tasks of overseeing operations and ensuring productivity. A successful manager is now expected to act as a leader, a mentor, and a coach, guiding their team members towards individual and collective success. This paradigm shift highlights the significance of coaching techniques in the realm of managerial responsibilities.


The Transformation of Managerial Roles

Evolving Leadership Expectations

The traditional image of a manager as a stern authority figure has given way to a more holistic view of leadership. Managers are now expected to serve as role models, motivators, and mentors to their teams. This shift stems from the recognition that employees perform at their best when they feel valued, supported, and empowered.

The evolution of leadership expectations can be traced back to the changing dynamics of the modern workplace. In the past, managers were primarily responsible for enforcing rules and ensuring productivity. However, as organizations began to realize that employee engagement and satisfaction were crucial for success, a transformation in managerial roles ensued.

Today, managers are not just tasked with overseeing tasks and projects; they are expected to inspire and empower their teams. This shift is partly a response to the changing nature of work itself. In a knowledge-based economy, where creativity, innovation, and adaptability are paramount, traditional top-down management no longer suffices.


Coaching as a Leadership Skill

Coaching has emerged as a pivotal leadership skill that fosters personal and professional growth. We'll explore how coaching techniques, such as active listening, constructive feedback, and goal-setting, can empower managers to become effective leaders who inspire and guide their teams towards excellence.

Coaching is not a one-size-fits-all approach; it is a dynamic and personalized method of leadership. Effective coaches adapt their style to the needs and preferences of individual team members. They actively listen to understand the unique challenges and aspirations of each employee, fostering a sense of trust and rapport.

Moreover, coaching is not merely about providing solutions but guiding employees to discover answers themselves. This approach instills a sense of ownership and accountability in team members. It encourages them to take the initiative, think critically, and develop problem-solving skills—a valuable asset in today's fast-paced, ever-changing business landscape.

Coaching also plays a crucial role in setting and achieving goals. Effective managers use coaching techniques to collaboratively define clear, actionable objectives with their team members. This process not only aligns individual efforts with organizational goals but also empowers employees to track their progress and make necessary adjustments along the way.


Coaching Knowledge for Career Development

Career Development in the Modern Workplace

Career development is a top priority for employees. Discover how coaching knowledge equips managers with the tools to help team members navigate their career paths, set meaningful goals, and continually improve their skills.

Career development has evolved from being a peripheral concern to a central focus in the modern workplace. In an era marked by rapid technological advancements and industry disruptions, employees recognize the importance of continuous learning and skill enhancement to remain relevant and competitive.

This heightened emphasis on career development places managers at the forefront of helping their team members chart their professional journeys. Coaching knowledge equips managers with the ability to provide guidance that is not only aligned with the organization's needs but also tailored to the aspirations of individual employees.

One of the key advantages of coaching in career development is its ability to facilitate self-awareness. Effective coaches help employees identify their strengths, weaknesses, interests, and values. Armed with this self-knowledge, employees can make informed career decisions that align with their passions and long-term goals.


The Manager as a Career Development Partner

Explore the responsibilities of middle and top managers in preparing and mentoring personal development plans for their team members. Learn how these plans can align with organizational objectives and create a win-win situation for both employees and the company.

Managers who actively engage in career development become indispensable partners in their employees' professional growth. They play a pivotal role in creating personalized development plans that leverage individual strengths and address areas needing improvement.

These development plans not only benefit the employees but also the organization. By aligning individual development goals with the company's strategic objectives, managers ensure that every team member's growth contributes to the overall success of the business.

Furthermore, coaching techniques are instrumental in fostering a growth mindset within teams. Managers can use coaching to encourage employees to embrace challenges, persist in the face of setbacks, and view failures as opportunities for learning and improvement. This mindset shift has a profound impact on team performance and innovation.


Coaching for Internal Education and Employee Development

The Role of Managers in Internal Education

Managers often bear the responsibility of nurturing a culture of learning within their teams and organizations. Explore how coaching methods can be instrumental in identifying and addressing skill gaps, fostering innovation, and supporting ongoing employee development.

Organizations that prioritize learning and development gain a competitive edge. Managers are at the forefront of this initiative, serving as the catalysts for continuous improvement and innovation within their teams.

Coaching methods play a pivotal role in identifying and addressing skill gaps. By regularly assessing the competencies of their team members, managers can tailor training and development programs to bridge these gaps effectively. This proactive approach not only enhances individual skills but also bolsters the organization's overall capabilities.

Moreover, coaching encourages a culture of innovation. Effective coaches inspire creativity and critical thinking in their teams. They challenge employees to question the status quo, explore new ideas, and experiment with novel approaches. In this way, managers act as innovation champions, driving progress and adaptability.


Coaching as a Tool for Employee Empowerment

Employee empowerment is a cornerstone of effective leadership. Coaching techniques provide managers with the tools to empower their team members by fostering a sense of ownership and autonomy in their roles.

One of the primary ways coaching empowers employees is by promoting self-directed learning. Instead of relying solely on formal training programs, employees learn to identify their development needs and take initiative in seeking resources and opportunities for growth. Managers who coach effectively encourage this proactive approach.

Furthermore, coaching cultivates a growth-oriented mindset among employees. By creating an environment where continuous learning is celebrated, managers inspire their teams to thrive in an ever-changing business landscape. This culture of learning becomes a strategic advantage for organizations, as it enables them to adapt quickly to new challenges and opportunities.


Coaching for Mental Health and Well-being

The Manager as a Trusted Support System

For many employees, especially those who live alone or lack a strong support network, a manager can become their most trusted confidant. Understand how coaching methods extend beyond professional development to support the mental health and well-being of team members.

The relationship between a manager and their team members extends beyond the confines of the workplace. In some cases, a manager may be the primary source of support for an employee, especially when they are facing personal challenges or seeking guidance related to their mental health and well-being.

Coaching methods are not limited to career development; they encompass the whole spectrum of an employee's life. Effective managers create an environment where team members feel comfortable discussing personal challenges and seeking guidance when needed. This trust and openness are essential for maintaining employee well-being.

In situations where employees are dealing with stress, anxiety, or other mental health issues, managers with coaching skills can provide valuable support. They can listen empathetically, offer guidance on stress management techniques, and help employees access appropriate resources for professional help when necessary.

Life is filled with complexities, and employees often grapple with personal challenges that can affect their work performance and overall well-being. Managers who are skilled in coaching can offer valuable guidance during these times of need.

One area where coaching is particularly beneficial is work-life balance. In today's fast-paced world, employees often struggle to juggle their professional and personal responsibilities. Managers can use coaching techniques to help team members set boundaries, manage their time effectively, and achieve a healthier work-life balance.

Managers can offer insights into effective communication, conflict resolution, and building positive relationships, which can significantly impact an employee's overall quality of life.

Managers trained in coaching can provide a supportive and non-judgmental space for employees to explore their feelings, identify potential solutions, and develop action plans to address these challenges.


In conclusion, coaching techniques have become indispensable in the modern workplace, particularly within the roles of managers and leaders. courseDetails.title: Estratégia e Desenvolvimento de Produtos
courseDetails.shortDescription: Diploma Profissional em Metodologias de Investigação em Estratégia e Desenvolvimento de Produtos pelo MTF Institute
courseDetails.longDescription:
Bem-vindo ao Curso: Diploma Profissional em Metodologias de Investigação em Estratégia e Desenvolvimento de Produtos pelo MTF Institute


Curso ministrado pelo MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

O MTF é um instituto global de educação e investigação com sede em Lisboa, Portugal, focado na formação empresarial e profissional híbrida (presencial e online) nas áreas de: Negócios e Administração, Ciência e Tecnologia, Banca e Finanças.

O centro de I&D do MTF foca-se em atividades de investigação nas áreas de: Inteligência Artificial, Aprendizagem Automática ("Machine Learning"), Ciência de Dados, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Criptomoedas e Ativos Digitais, Metaversos, Transformação Digital, Fintech, Comércio Eletrónico, e Internet das Coisas.

O MTF é parceiro oficial da: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, membro da Câmara Portuguesa de Comércio e Indústria.

O MTF está presente em 208 países e foi escolhido por mais de 420 000 alunos.


Autora do Curso:

Alex Amoroso é uma profissional experiente com uma sólida formação académica e empresarial, especializada em metodologias de investigação, formulação de estratégias, e desenvolvimento de produtos. Doutorada pela Faculdade de Ciências Sociais e Políticas de Lisboa, Portugal, onde foi Aprovada com Distinção e Louvor pela sua investigação exemplar, Alex Amoroso traz consigo um vasto conhecimento e experiência.

Para além dos seus estudos de doutoramento, a Doutora Amoroso tem atuado como Professora Convidada, ministrando cursos a uma vasta gama de estudantes desde a licenciatura até alunos de cursos profissionais e executivos. Atualmente, na EIMT em Zurique, Suíça, leciona para doutorandos, oferecendo instrução avançada em desenho e metodologias de investigação. No Instituto MTF, a Doutora Amoroso lidera a área académica de Desenvolvimento de Produto.

Em sinergia entre a experiência académica e empresarial, a Doutora Amoroso alcançou elevados resultados na sua carreira profissional, liderando atividades de I&D, desenvolvimento de produtos, desenvolvimento estratégico, e análise de mercado num vasto leque de empresas. Implementou as melhores práticas de mercado em setores que vão da Banca e Finanças, ao PropTech, Consultoria e Investigação, e Startups Inovadoras.

A extensa produção científica de Alex Amoroso inclui numerosos artigos publicados em revistas conceituadas, bem como apresentações orais e posters em conferências internacionais. Os resultados da sua investigação têm sido apresentados em instituições de renome como a Faculdade de Ciências Políticas e Sociais e a Stressed Out Conference na UCL, entre outras.

Com uma paixão pela colaboração interdisciplinar e um compromisso em impulsionar mudanças positivas, Alex Amoroso dedica-se a capacitar alunos e profissionais para a utilização de metodologias de vanguarda para alcançar a excelência no mundo empresarial global.


Objetivos do Curso:

● Dotar-vos de conhecimentos e competências para uma eficaz tomada de decisão

● Enfatizar a inovação centrada no ser humano e o conhecimento executável

● Abordagem multidisciplinar para a inovação e desenvolvimento de produtos


O que são Metodologias de Investigação em Estratégia e Desenvolvimento de Produtos?

As metodologias de investigação em estratégia e desenvolvimento de produtos são as abordagens e ferramentas estruturadas utilizadas para recolher, analisar e interpretar informação que apoia planos estratégicos e a criação de produtos. Garantem que as decisões estão enraizadas em provas e nas necessidades dos clientes, e não em suposições.


Principais Focos das Metodologias de Investigação em Estratégia e Desenvolvimento de Produtos

● Estudo de Mercado: Compreender a dimensão, tendências, concorrência e oportunidades dentro de um mercado ou indústria específica.

● Investigação de Clientes: Investigar as necessidades, pontos problemáticos, comportamentos e preferências do seu público-alvo.

● Análise da Concorrência: Avaliar os pontos fortes, fracos, estratégias e quota de mercado dos concorrentes.

● Análise de Tendências: Identificar padrões emergentes, tecnologias, ou preferências dos clientes que possam moldar o futuro.

● Análise Interna: Analisar os pontos fortes, fraquezas, capacidades e recursos de uma empresa para informar a estratégia.

● Teste de Conceito de Produto: Recolher feedback sobre ideias de produtos propostas numa fase inicial do processo de desenvolvimento.

● Teste de Usabilidade: Avaliar se um produto é fácil e intuitivo de usar.
targetAudiences: Sem requisitos especiais. Um curso para qualquer pessoa que queira construir uma carreira em Estratégia e Desenvolvimento de Produtos

courseDetails.longDescription:
Congratulations, You Found It!

The most bang for you buck sales course and the only one you'll ever need. 


Embark on a transformative journey through the world of sales with this comprehensive 20-in-1 guide. This is your one-stop solution to mastering the art and science of sales, drawing from two decades of real-world experience and cutting-edge strategies.

Whether you're a novice looking to break into the sales industry or a seasoned professional aiming to sharpen your skills, this course offers invaluable insights for every stage of your career. We've distilled 20 years of sales knowledge into a series of engaging, easy-to-follow modules that cover every aspect of modern sales operations.

Our course begins with the fundamentals, ensuring you have a solid foundation in business basics. From there, we'll guide you through the intricacies of sales management, funnels, operations and prospecting teaching you how to build and lead high-performing sales teams. You'll learn the secrets of effective neuromarketing marketing strategies that complement your sales efforts, creating a powerful synergy that drives results.

One of the cornerstones of our course is the deep dive into sales funnels. We'll show you how to construct, optimize, and manage sales funnels that convert prospects into loyal customers. You'll master the art of nurturing leads and closing deals with confidence and finesse.

Business development is another crucial area we cover extensively. Learn how to identify new opportunities, expand your market reach, and foster lasting relationships with clients and partners. Our strategies will help you grow your business sustainably and profitably.

But we don't stop at traditional methods. As the business world evolves, so do sales techniques. That's why we've included cutting-edge modules on the future of AI in business. Discover how artificial intelligence is revolutionising sales operations and learn to leverage these powerful tools to stay ahead of the competition.


What You'll Learn:

  1. Foundational Skills: Start strong with a solid understanding of business fundamentals and craft compelling business ideas that resonate with your target market.

  2. Sales Psychology: Explore psychological concepts like the Marshmallow Test to understand the importance of patience and strategic thinking in sales.

  3. Confidence Building: Learn how to cultivate quiet dedication and self-confidence that leads to consistent sales performance.

  4. Sales Management: Master the art of building and leading high-performing teams.

  5. Marketing Synergy: Discover effective marketing strategies that complement your sales efforts, creating a powerful synergy that drives results.

  6. Sales Funnels: Construct, optimize, and manage sales funnels that convert prospects into loyal customers.

  7. Business Development: Identify new opportunities, expand your market reach, and foster lasting relationships with clients and partners.

  8. Advanced Techniques: Dive into AI-driven sales strategies, prospecting methods, and the importance of buyer personas to tailor your approach to every customer.

  9. Goal Setting with SMART Framework: Learn how to set and achieve goals that are Specific, Measurable, Attainable, Relevant, and Time-bound.

Throughout the course, you'll benefit from:

  • Real-world case studies that bring concepts to life

  • Practical exercises to reinforce your learning

  • Downloadable resources and templates to apply in your daily work

  • Expert interviews offering diverse perspectives on sales success

  • Quizzes and assessments to track your progress

Who Should Take This Course?

  • Aspiring sales professionals looking to build a strong foundation

  • Current sales reps aiming to enhance their skills with advanced techniques

  • Sales managers seeking to lead high-performing teams

  • Business owners wanting to optimize sales operations and drive growth

  • Anyone interested in mastering modern sales techniques

By the end of this comprehensive course, you'll have a robust toolkit of sales strategies, a deep understanding of sales operations, and the confidence to tackle any challenge in your sales career. From prospecting to closing, from team management to technological integration, you'll be equipped to excel in every aspect of the sales process.

Don't miss this opportunity to revolutionize your approach to sales. And take the first step towards becoming a sales powerhouse in today's dynamic business landscape. Your journey to sales excellence starts here!

Transform your career and drive your business to new heights.  Join us today and start your path to becoming a true sales operations expert!

Welcome to the groundbreaking course "Supercharging Your Business with AI Tools"! Are you ready to harness the power of artificial intelligence to take your business to the next level? This course is specifically designed for entrepreneurs, sales professionals, and business leaders who want to integrate cutting-edge AI technologies into their operations to work smarter, more efficiently, and achieve greater success.

We live in an era where AI is no longer a distant concept but an essential tool for businesses of all sizes. Whether you’re looking to improve your sales processes, forecast trends more accurately, or optimize your operational efficiency—AI is the key to future-proofing your business. In this course, we’ll show you how to practically implement AI tools to drive immediate results.

What can you expect?

  • AI-powered lead scoring and qualification: Discover how AI can help you prioritize leads and increase conversion rates by gaining insights into customer behavior and purchase intent. You’ll learn how to score and segment leads based on AI-driven analysis.

  • Predictive analytics for sales forecasting: Learn how AI can assist in making accurate sales forecasts. We’ll delve into predictive models that not only show you what has happened in the past but also provide insights into future sales and trends.

  • AI-enabled sales analytics and reporting: Explore how AI can automate your reporting and analytics, giving you real-time insights into your sales team’s performance. With real-time data analysis, you can make quicker decisions and adjust your strategy based on facts.

  • Chat-GPT plugins: Unleash the power of GPT models like ChatGPT and learn how to use plugins to optimize your workflows. From generating text to automating customer service, Chat-GPT makes complex tasks simple and efficient.

  • Using built-in AI tools in Microsoft Excel: Many businesses rely on Excel daily, but did you know that its built-in AI tools can do so much more? We’ll show you how to perform data analysis, visualization, and even predictive analytics with these powerful AI features.

  • Using tools like Numerous AI: We’ll dive into modern tools like Numerous AI, which allow you to quickly and easily apply powerful AI analysis and insights to your data. These tools help you transform complex datasets into actionable information.

  • And much more: Beyond the topics mentioned, we’ll introduce you to various other AI tools and technologies that can help grow your business. From automation to deep learning techniques, this course provides you with a complete toolkit for success.

Whether you're an experienced professional or new to AI, this course will give you the knowledge and skills to leverage AI in a practical and strategic way. Get ready not only to optimize your sales processes but to transform your entire business operation with the power of artificial intelligence.

Sign up today and prepare your business for the future!

  6. Operations Managers

  8. IT Professionals

    • Technology specialists supporting sales and marketing teams, seeking to integrate AI tools with existing business systems to improve productivity and efficiency.

  9. Product Managers

  10. Financial Advisors and Analysts

  • Finance professionals interested in using predictive analytics for sales forecasting and understanding how AI tools can provide better financial insights for business performance.

  • How to integrate AI tools into existing business processes for lead scoring, predictive sales forecasting, and customer analytics.

  • How to use AI-powered reporting and analytics tools to gain actionable business insights.

  • How to work with Chat-GPT plugins and AI-powered functions in Excel for more efficient data management.
